data.why:
I plan to add several Java<->Perl modules The first one will be
    Java::ObjectInputStream which will allow a Perl application to
    de-serialized a java object and see that involved data (At the
    moment only data viewing is capable) examples of use would be a post
    parser to tcpdump to examine RMI data over the wire or to exchange
    messages over JMS

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (SSCOTTO; Salvatore E. ScottoDiLuzio)
